english.segment1: We are questions that beg for the answers. We are poems awaiting the rhyme. We are riddles that long for solution. With your breath we come alive
english.segment2: We are silenced when searching for reasons. We are weary and broken inside. We are desperate for your affection. We are darkness you are light
english.segment3: Awaken us, Awaken us. Stir in our hearts your truth. Awaken us, Awaken us. That we might live for you. We are ashes, we are dust. Awaken us
english.segment4: You whispered the dawn of creation. And your love has been on display. You have promised that you would be with us. We need you, every day
